text: Ani tya velecehi smarana rakhale pahije ki jevha tumacya palanakartyane sangitale ki to ya (yahudi) lokanvara kayamataparyanta asa manasala acchadita thevila jo yanna kathora siksedvare duhkha pohacavita rahila. Nihsansaya, tumaca palanakarta lavakaraca siksa-yatana denara ahe ani nihsansaya to kharokhara motha mapha karanara ani dayavana ahe
